reviews.review_msg: Great guy and professor. Very reasonable and respectable as well as understanding. Tries hard to make dry material easy to understand. Glad I had this class online with Ted.

The comments prior to this can't possibly be from the same course/prof. This is the WORST course I've ever taken in terms of access to TM/pr and required materials. The prof's son is taking his dad's course! Conflict of interest or what! (See ch 5 of text
